# GxEScanR

The goal of GxEScanR is to be a set of tools that can used on genomewide interactions studies(GWIS).

## Installation

You can install the released version of GxEScanR from [github](https://www.github.com) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("jimb3/GxEScanR")
```
